20101228141321.000|20101228141323.000|CC1|SO IN TODAY'S PRESENT AGE WE'RE 
20101228141323.000|20101228141324.000|CC1|GOING TO GO OVER WHAT IS

20101228141325.000|20101228141326.000|CC1|HOW DO YOU CONDUCT IT?          
20101228141326.000|20101228141330.000|CC1|HOW DO YOU ANALYZE THE RESEARCH?

20101228141332.000|20101228141333.000|CC1|IN AND YOU CAN HIRE A GREAT

20101228141336.000|20101228141337.000|CC1|FIELD AND GOES INTO THE

20101228141338.000|20101228141340.000|CC1|AND COMES BACK WITH THE BIG PILE
20101228141340.000|20101228141343.000|CC1|OF PAPERS AND SAYS, HERE'S YOUR 
20101228141343.000|20101228141343.000|CC1|RESEARCH.                       
20101228141343.000|20101228141344.000|CC1|HAVE FUN ON THE CAMPAIGN TRAIL. 
20101228141344.000|20101228141345.000|CC1|THAT'S NOT THE END OF THE ROAD. 
20101228141345.000|20101228141347.000|CC1|YOU HAVE TO ANALYZE IT.         
20101228141347.000|20101228141348.000|CC1|AND YOU HAVE TO FIGURE OUT TO   
20101228141348.000|20101228141351.000|CC1|USE IT AND WHAT DOES THIS MEAN? 
20101228141351.000|20101228141353.000|CC1|WE'VE ALSO SEEN OVER THE LAST 5 
20101228141353.000|20101228141355.000|CC1|TO 10 YEARS A HUGE REVOLUTION IN
20101228141355.000|20101228141400.000|CC1|HOW RESEARCH IS DONE AND HOW
